units.title: Generate organoid cultures and perform drug sensitivity assays
units.text: N.Sa. generated organoid cultures and performed drug sensitivity assays.
units.rationale: Describes the creation of organoids and testing their drug response.

units.title: Assist with drug sensitivity assays
units.text: D.A.E. provided assistance with drug sensitivity assays.
units.rationale: Indicates support for the execution of drug testing.

units.title: Analyze and interpret sequencing data
units.text: S.F.R. and H.L.-S. analysed and interpreted the sequencing data.
units.rationale: Specifies the bioinformatic processing of sequencing results.

units.title: Derive phylogenies
units.rationale: Outlines the construction of evolutionary trees from data.

units.title: Perform signature analysis
units.rationale: Details a computational step to identify mutational signatures.

units.title: Analyze and interpret methylation data
units.text: S.F.R. and M.D.Y. analysed and interpreted methylation.
units.rationale: Covers the assessment of DNA methylation patterns.

units.title: Contribute to statistical analyses
units.text: H.L., S.G. and P.J.C. contributed to statistical analyses.
units.rationale: Notes involvement in quantitative evaluation of results.

units.title: Generate figures
units.rationale: Indicates preparation of visual data representations.

units.title: Provide data on WNTâ€‘sensitive cells
units.text: rendered cells highly sensitive to the WNT secretion/porcupine are available in the online version of the paper at https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-018-0024-3.
units.rationale: Points to the availability of a specific cell resource for replication.
